mapper.select: select count(*) from Camp_info1

managenmpr, gnrlsiteco, autositeco, glampsiteco, caravsiteco, indvdlcaravSiteco, sitedstnc, sitemg1width, sitemg2width, sitemg3width, sitemg1vrticl, sitemg2vrticl, sitemg3vrticl, sitemg1co, sitemg2co, swrmco, wtrplco, braziercl, extshrco, frprvtwrppco, frprvtsandco, firesensorco, eqpmnlendcl, insrncat, trsagntno, bizrno, facltdivnm, mangedivnm, mgcdiv, managesttus from (select a.contentid , a.facltnm, a.lineintro, a.intro, a.allar,a.hvofbgnde,a.hvofenddle,a.featurenm,a.induty,a.lctcl,a.donm,a.sigungunm,a.zipcode,a.addr1,a.addr2, a.mapx,a.mapy,a.direction,a.tel,a.homepage,a.resveurl,a.resvecl,a.sbrscl,a.sbrsetc,a.posblfcltycl,a.posblfcltyetc,a.cltureventat,a.clturevent,a.exprnprogrmat,a.exprnprogrm, a.themaenvrncl,a.animalcmgcl,a.toureracl,a.firstimageurl,a.createdtime,a.modifiedtime,good,readcount, b.contentid AS bcontentid ,b.managenmpr,b.gnrlsiteco,b.autositeco,b.glampsiteco,b.caravsiteco,b.indvdlcaravSiteco,b.sitedstnc,b.sitemg1width,b.sitemg2width,b.sitemg3width,b.sitemg1vrticl,b.sitemg2vrticl,b.sitemg3vrticl, b.sitemg1co,b.sitemg2co,b.sitemg3co,b.sitebottomcl1,b.sitebottomcl2,b.sitebottomcl3,b.sitebottomcl4,b.sitebottomcl5,b.tooltip,b.glampinnerfclty,b.caravinnerfclty, c.contentid AS ccontentid ,c.prmisnde,c.operpdcl,c.operdecl,c.trleracmpnyat,c.caravacmpnyat,c.toiletco,c.swrmco,c.wtrplco,c.braziercl,c.extshrco,c.frprvtwrppco,c.frprvtsandco, c.firesensorco,c.eqpmnlendcl,c.insrncat,c.trsagntno,c.bizrno,c.facltdivnm,c.mangedivnm,c.mgcdiv,c.managesttus from camp_info1 a, camp_info2 b, camp_info3 c where a.contentid = b.contentid and b.contentid = c.contentid) where contentid = #{contentid}
select count(*) from Camp_info1 where ${sql}

select contentid, facltnm, lineintro, intro, allar, hvofbgnde, hvofenddle, featurenm, induty, lctcl, donm, sigungunm, zipcode, addr1, addr2, mapx, mapy, direction, tel, homepage, resveurl, resvecl, sbrscl, sbrsetc, posblfcltycl, posblfcltyetc, cltureventat, clturevent, exprnprogrmat, exprnprogrm, themaenvrncl, animalcmgcl, toureracl, firstimageurl, createdtime, modifiedtime,good,readcount,r from (select contentid, facltnm, lineintro, intro, allar, hvofbgnde, hvofenddle, featurenm, induty, lctcl, donm, sigungunm, zipcode, addr1, addr2, mapx, mapy, direction, tel, homepage, resveurl, resvecl, sbrscl, sbrsetc, posblfcltycl, posblfcltyetc, cltureventat, clturevent, exprnprogrmat, exprnprogrm, themaenvrncl, animalcmgcl, toureracl, firstimageurl, createdtime, modifiedtime,good,readcount,rownum r from camp_info1 where ${sql} order by modifiedtime desc )
select count(*) from Camp_info1 where facltnm like '%${keyword}%' or donm like '%${keyword}%' or sigungunm like '%${keyword}%'
select count(*) from good where contentid = #{contentid} and id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete good where contentid=#{contentid} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from keyword where keyword = #{keyword}
select keyword,s_count from keyword order by s_count desc
SELECT DISTINCT sigungunm FROM camp_info1 order by sigungunm
mapper.insert: insert into temp_camp_info1(contentid, facltnm, lineintro, intro, allar, hvofbgnde, hvofenddle, featurenm, induty, lctcl, donm, sigungunm, zipcode, addr1, addr2, mapx, mapy, direction, tel, homepage, resveurl, resvecl, sbrscl, sbrsetc, posblfcltycl, posblfcltyetc, cltureventat, clturevent, exprnprogrmat, exprnprogrm, themaenvrncl, animalcmgcl, toureracl, firstimageurl, createdtime, modifiedtime) values(seq_temp_camp_info1.nextval, #{facltnm}, #{lineintro}, #{intro}, #{allar}, #{hvofbgnde}, #{hvofenddle}, #{featurenm}, #{induty}, #{lctcl}, #{donm},#{sigungunm}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},#{direction},#{tel},#{homepage},#{resveurl},#{resvecl},#{sbrscl},#{sbrsetc},#{posblfcltycl},#{posblfcltyetc}, #{cltureventat},#{clturevent},#{exprnprogrmat},#{exprnprogrm},#{themaenvrncl},#{animalcmgcl}, #{toureracl},#{firstimageurl},sysdate,sysdate)

insert into temp_camp_info2(contentid, managenmpr, gnrlsiteco, autositeco, glampsiteco, caravsiteco, indvdlcaravSiteco, sitedstnc, sitemg1width, sitemg2width, sitemg3width, sitemg1vrticl, sitemg2vrticl, sitemg3vrticl, sitemg1co, sitemg2co, sitemg3co, sitebottomcl1, sitebottomcl2, sitebottomcl3, sitebottomcl4, sitebottomcl5, tooltip, glampinnerfclty, caravinnerfclty) values(seq_temp_camp_info2.nextval, #{managenmpr}, #{gnrlsiteco}, #{autositeco}, #{glampsiteco}, #{caravsiteco}, #{indvdlcaravSiteco}, #{sitedstnc}, #{sitemg1width}, #{sitemg2width}, #{sitemg3width},#{sitemg1vrticl}, #{sitemg2vrticl}, #{sitemg3vrticl}, #{sitemg1co}, #{sitemg2co}, #{sitemg3co},#{sitebottomcl1},#{sitebottomcl2},#{sitebottomcl3},#{sitebottomcl4},#{sitebottomcl5},#{tooltip},#{glampinnerfclty},#{caravinnerfclty})

insert into temp_camp_info3(contentid, prmisnde, operpdcl, operdecl, trleracmpnyat, caravacmpnyat, toiletco, swrmco, wtrplco, braziercl, extshrco, frprvtwrppco, frprvtsandco, firesensorco, eqpmnlendcl, insrncat, trsagntno, bizrno, facltdivnm, mangedivnm, mgcdiv, managesttus) values(seq_temp_camp_info3.nextval, #{prmisnde}, #{operpdcl}, #{operdecl}, #{trleracmpnyat}, #{caravacmpnyat}, #{toiletco}, #{swrmco}, #{wtrplco}, #{braziercl}, #{extshrco},#{frprvtwrppco}, #{frprvtsandco}, #{firesensorco}, #{eqpmnlendcl}, #{insrncat}, #{trsagntno},#{bizrno},#{facltdivnm},#{mangedivnm},#{mgcdiv},#{managesttus})
mapper.select: select count(*) from keyworddate where keyword = #{keyword} and keyworddate = TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.update: update keyworddate set s_count = s_count +1 where keyword = #{keyword} and keyworddate = TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.select: select count(*) from readdate where contentid = #{contentid} and readdate = TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select count(*) from readdate where TO_DATE(readdate,'yy/mm/dd') = #{readdate}

SELECT bCONTENTID, FACLTNM ,READCOUNT, READDATE FROM (select b.contentid AS bcontentid, b.facltnm, a.CONTENTID AS acontentid,a.READCOUNT, a.READDATE from readdate a,camp_info1 b where a.contentid = b.contentid) WHERE TO_DATE(readdate,'yy/mm/dd') = #{readdate} order by readcount desc
SELECT CONTENTID, FACLTNM ,READCOUNT FROM camp_info1 order by readcount desc
mapper.update: update readdate set readcount = readcount +1 where contentid = #{contentid} and readdate = TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM keyworddate WHERE TO_DATE(keyworddate,'yy/mm/dd') = #{keyworddate}
SELECT keyword,s_count FROM keyworddate WHERE TO_DATE(keyworddate,'yy/mm/dd') = #{keyworddate} order by s_count desc
SELECT CONTENTID, FACLTNM ,Good FROM camp_info1 order by good desc
SELECT CONTENTID, FACLTNM FROM temp_camp_info1 order by contentid desc
SELECT CONTENTID, FACLTNM FROM update_camp_info1 order by contentid desc

mapper.insert: insert into camp_info1(contentid, facltnm, lineintro, intro, allar, hvofbgnde, hvofenddle, featurenm, induty, lctcl, donm, sigungunm, zipcode, addr1, addr2, mapx, mapy, direction, tel, homepage, resveurl, resvecl, sbrscl, sbrsetc, posblfcltycl, posblfcltyetc, cltureventat, clturevent, exprnprogrmat, exprnprogrm, themaenvrncl, animalcmgcl, toureracl, firstimageurl, createdtime, modifiedtime, good, readcount) values(#{contentid}, #{facltnm}, #{lineintro}, #{intro}, #{allar}, #{hvofbgnde}, #{hvofenddle}, #{featurenm}, #{induty}, #{lctcl}, #{donm},#{sigungunm}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},#{direction},#{tel},#{homepage},#{resveurl},#{resvecl},#{sbrscl},#{sbrsetc},#{posblfcltycl},#{posblfcltyetc}, #{cltureventat},#{clturevent},#{exprnprogrmat},#{exprnprogrm},#{themaenvrncl},#{animalcmgcl}, #{toureracl},#{firstimageurl},sysdate,sysdate ,0 ,0)

insert into update_camp_info1(contentid, facltnm, lineintro, intro, allar, hvofbgnde, hvofenddle, featurenm, induty, lctcl, donm, sigungunm, zipcode, addr1, addr2, mapx, mapy, direction, tel, homepage, resveurl, resvecl, sbrscl, sbrsetc, posblfcltycl, posblfcltyetc, cltureventat, clturevent, exprnprogrmat, exprnprogrm, themaenvrncl, animalcmgcl, toureracl, firstimageurl, createdtime, modifiedtime ) values(#{contentid}, #{facltnm}, #{lineintro}, #{intro}, #{allar}, #{hvofbgnde}, #{hvofenddle}, #{featurenm}, #{induty}, #{lctcl}, #{donm},#{sigungunm}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},#{direction},#{tel},#{homepage},#{resveurl},#{resvecl},#{sbrscl},#{sbrsetc},#{posblfcltycl},#{posblfcltyetc}, #{cltureventat},#{clturevent},#{exprnprogrmat},#{exprnprogrm},#{themaenvrncl},#{animalcmgcl}, #{toureracl},#{firstimageurl},#{createdtime},sysdate )

insert into update_camp_info2(contentid, managenmpr, gnrlsiteco, autositeco, glampsiteco, caravsiteco, indvdlcaravSiteco, sitedstnc, sitemg1width, sitemg2width, sitemg3width, sitemg1vrticl, sitemg2vrticl, sitemg3vrticl, sitemg1co, sitemg2co, sitemg3co, sitebottomcl1, sitebottomcl2, sitebottomcl3, sitebottomcl4, sitebottomcl5, tooltip, glampinnerfclty, caravinnerfclty) values(#{contentid}, #{managenmpr}, #{gnrlsiteco}, #{autositeco}, #{glampsiteco}, #{caravsiteco}, #{indvdlcaravSiteco}, #{sitedstnc}, #{sitemg1width}, #{sitemg2width}, #{sitemg3width},#{sitemg1vrticl}, #{sitemg2vrticl}, #{sitemg3vrticl}, #{sitemg1co}, #{sitemg2co}, #{sitemg3co},#{sitebottomcl1},#{sitebottomcl2},#{sitebottomcl3},#{sitebottomcl4},#{sitebottomcl5},#{tooltip},#{glampinnerfclty},#{caravinnerfclty})

insert into update_camp_info3(contentid, prmisnde, operpdcl, operdecl, trleracmpnyat, caravacmpnyat, toiletco, swrmco, wtrplco, braziercl, extshrco, frprvtwrppco, frprvtsandco, firesensorco, eqpmnlendcl, insrncat, trsagntno, bizrno, facltdivnm, mangedivnm, mgcdiv, managesttus) values(#{contentid}, #{prmisnde}, #{operpdcl}, #{operdecl}, #{trleracmpnyat}, #{caravacmpnyat}, #{toiletco}, #{swrmco}, #{wtrplco}, #{braziercl}, #{extshrco},#{frprvtwrppco}, #{frprvtsandco}, #{firesensorco}, #{eqpmnlendcl}, #{insrncat}, #{trsagntno},#{bizrno},#{facltdivnm},#{mangedivnm},#{mgcdiv},#{managesttus})
mapper.update: update camp_info1 set facltnm=#{facltnm}, lineintro=#{lineintro}, intro=#{intro}, allar=#{allar}, hvofbgnde=#{hvofbgnde}, hvofenddle=#{hvofenddle}, featurenm=#{featurenm}, induty=#{induty}, lctcl=#{lctcl}, donm=#{donm},sigungunm=#{sigungunm}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, mapx=#{mapx}, mapy=#{mapy}, direction=#{direction}, tel=#{tel}, homepage=#{homepage}, resveurl=#{resveurl}, resvecl=#{resvecl}, sbrscl=#{sbrscl},sbrsetc=#{sbrsetc}, posblfcltycl=#{posblfcltycl}, posblfcltyetc=#{posblfcltyetc}, cltureventat=#{cltureventat}, clturevent=#{clturevent}, exprnprogrmat=#{exprnprogrmat}, exprnprogrm=#{exprnprogrm}, themaenvrncl=#{themaenvrncl}, animalcmgcl=#{animalcmgcl}, toureracl=#{toureracl}, firstimageurl=#{firstimageurl}, createdtime=#{createdtime}, modifiedtime=#{modifiedtime}, where contentid=#{contentid}

update camp_info2 set managenmpr=#{managenmpr}, gnrlsiteco=#{gnrlsiteco}, autositeco=#{autositeco}, glampsiteco=#{glampsiteco}, caravsiteco=#{caravsiteco}, indvdlcaravSiteco=#{indvdlcaravSiteco}, sitedstnc=#{sitedstnc},sitemg1width=#{sitemg1width}, sitemg2width=#{sitemg2width}, sitemg3width=#{sitemg3width}, sitemg1vrticl=#{sitemg1vrticl}, sitemg2vrticl=#{sitemg2vrticl}, sitemg3vrticl=#{sitemg3vrticl}, sitemg1co=#{sitemg1co}, sitemg2co=#{sitemg2co}, sitemg3co=#{sitemg3co}, sitebottomcl1=#{sitebottomcl1}, sitebottomcl2=#{sitebottomcl2}, sitebottomcl3=#{sitebottomcl3}, sitebottomcl4=#{sitebottomcl4}, sitebottomcl5=#{sitebottomcl5},tooltip=#{tooltip}, glampinnerfclty=#{glampinnerfclty}, caravinnerfclty=#{caravinnerfclty} where contentid=#{contentid}

select count(*) from Camp_info1 where facltnm like '%${keyword}%'
SELECT DISTINCT facltnm FROM camp_info1 order by facltnm
